text: "On an Evening in Roma" is a song released in 1959 by Dean Martin. The song spent 13 weeks on the Billboard Hot 100 chart, peaking at No. 59,Hot 100 - Dean Martin On An Evening in Roma Chart History, Billboard.com. Retrieved April 22, 2018. while reaching No. 36 on the Cash Box Top 100,"The Cash Box Top 100", Cash Box, August 29, 1959. p. 4. Retrieved April 22, 2018. and No. 31 on Canada's CHUM Hit Parade. ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (1959) !
